text.more: Each node in the graph is a publication, with the title annotated. An edge directed from one publication to another mean that the first publication has referenced the second. Gephi was used to find communities and create a layout of the graph.
text.intro: The literature around COVID-19, taken from https://www.kaggle.com/allen-institute-for-ai/CORD-19-research-challenge, is supplemented with Pubmed data on references. Contact: moritz.moeller.home@gmail.com.
text.title: Literature on COVID-19: Reference Structure
